name: youthfulness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being similar to or typical of young people: His face retained a youthfulness that his wife's had lost. Aging gracefully is better than keeping up a facade of eternal youthfulness.
the fact of being young: His relative youthfulness and message of change resonate on campus. He was concerned at the extreme youthfulness of Diana, but hoped she would grow into her role.
More examplesFewer examplesI like the energy and the youthfulness of their music.She believes organic fresh foods hold the key to youthfulness and health.The youthfulness of the population is expected to become more pronounced in the next two decades as young people have children of their own.The youthfulness of the audience is nowhere more apparent than in the front rows.
